message.original: いいか―― 覚者の初陣には白竜の特別な加護がある
message.translation: The White Dragon has granted you a special blessing in your first battle, Arisen.

message.original: だから、実力以上の戦いができるはずだ 思う存分暴れてくれ
message.translation: Another fight! I'll rampage over our enemies!

message.original: 砦の守備隊は、ヴァネッサをはじめ精鋭ぞろい
message.translation: The fort's defense is comprised of many elite individuals, including Vanessa.

message.original: 救援要請なんて、もしかして初めてかも？
message.translation: What do you mean the first time you requested relief?

message.original: ここまでオークに押し込まれることなど この３００年、なかったことだ
message.translation: For over 300 years, the orcs haven't pushed this far.

message.original: 情勢はこの上なく深刻――さあ、急ぐぞ！
message.translation: The situation is grave! Come on, hurry!

message.original: 武器、用意！ 構えろ！
message.translation: Prepare yourself! Weapons at the ready!

message.original: 走れ～！
message.translation: Run!

message.original: 隙あらば掴みかかるんだ デカイ敵はよじ登って戦え
message.translation: Take a chance when the enemy drops their guard, and then climb the enemy to win the battle.

message.original: 体力減ったら回復アイテム！ 自己責任だぞ！
message.translation: If you run low on stamina recovery items, use defensive tactics to ensure you live.

message.original: ほら、砦へ急いで！
message.translation: Hurry to the fort!

message.original: 立派立派、まだ生きてる！ やるねえ！
message.translation: I'm fine! I'm fine! I'm still alive!

message.original: あのね――わたしの心配より自分の心配！
message.translation: Don't worry about me! Worry about yourself!

message.original: ここはまだ演習のようなもの――さあ、砦へ急げ！
message.translation: They're still fighting at the fort! Hurry!

message.original: バタバタしてるが、動きは悪くない 自信を持って戦え！
message.translation: You're flailing, but your movements show confidence in battle!

message.original: さあ、砦へ突入だ！
message.translation: Hurry! It's a race to the fort!

message.original: おい、どこへいく！
message.translation: Hey! Where do we go?!

message.original: そっちじゃないぞ！
message.translation: Not over there!

message.original: こっちへ来い！
message.translation: Come on over!

message.original: おい、回復しておけ！
message.translation: Hurry! Save the baby!

message.original: 回復アイテムを使うんだ！
message.translation: Use your recovery items!

message.original: もっと体力に気を配れ！
message.translation: Heed their strength!

message.original: くそ――回復してくれ
message.translation: Heal me.

message.original: すまん――自力回復できん
message.translation: Sorry, you'll have to heal yourself.

message.original: 俺を見殺しにする気か！
message.translation: I want to stare death down!

message.original: そっちじゃないって！
message.translation: I'm not over there!

message.original: ちゃんとついてきてよ！
message.translation: I got lucky!

message.original: どこいく気！？
message.translation: How do you feel?

message.original: ほら、回復しなさい、回復！
message.translation: Hurry! Heal! Heal!

message.original: 死にたいの？ いやなら回復！
message.translation: Do you want to die? You must hate healing!

message.original: 回復しなさいってば！
message.translation: Use some healing!

message.original: わたし、回復してほしいんだけど
message.translation: I don't want to stop to rest, but we have to.

message.original: こっち見て――回復して――
message.translation: Recover yourself here.

message.original: お願い――見捨てないで――
message.translation: Please don't abandon us.

message.original: 戦場の咆哮が聞こえるか？ 扉の先は、おそらく敵味方入り交じる混戦状態――
message.translation: Do you hear the roar of battle? Open the door, and we'll see if it's a friend or foe that still stands.

message.original: さあ、やっちゃって！ 今日のあんたには白竜の加護があるんだから！
message.translation: Come on! You're doing well today, due to the holy blessing you received!

message.original: さあ！ 全てのオークどもを切り倒せ！
message.translation: Here we go! Time to cut down some orcs!

message.original: ぷんぷん臭ってくるね ああ、腹立つ！ 許さないから！
message.translation: Show them the anger that you feel in your stomach. They'll rot when we cut them down!

message.original: 次から次へと来るぞ！ 体力に気をつけろ
message.translation: Come on! We need to move on! Remember to watch your endurance!

message.original: ひとりで全部倒してしまえ！ 遠慮は無用だ！
message.translation: You defeated it all by yourself! I was useless...

message.original: いいぞ！ その調子だ！
message.translation: Nice work! Keep it up!

message.original: ほら、来てるよ！ やっちゃえ！
message.translation: It's coming! Now is the time!

message.original: もう、鼻が曲がる～！ さっさと終わらせよう！
message.translation: Quickly! Drive your weapon right above its nose!

message.original: いいねえ！ あとはまかせちゃおうかな
message.translation: Fine work! That was quite an achievement.

message.original: いい調子だぞ！
message.translation: Good!

message.original: 敵は残り少ないぞ！ 押せ！
message.translation: The enemy's health is low! Press your advantage!

message.original: 追い風に乗れ！
message.translation: Good work riding the enemy!

message.original: くそっ！ 敵、増兵だ！
message.translation: Damn it! More enemies!

message.original: 増援だ！ 気を引きしめろ！
message.translation: Reinforcements! Don't give up!

message.original: まだいたのか！
message.translation: This is still ours!

message.original: もう少しだよ！
message.translation: Just a little more!

message.original: いい感じ！ このまま！
message.translation: I have a good feeling we can hold this!

message.original: 優勢優勢！
message.translation: Dominate them!

message.original: まだいたか！ くう～！
message.translation: Not yet!

message.original: 残念、敵が増えちゃった！
message.translation: Unfortunently, the enemy's strength grows.

message.original: あーあ、敵、増援だ！
message.translation: The enemy is reinforcing!

message.original: 頼りにしてるぞ、新人！
message.translation: We'll have to rely on the rookie!

message.original: ここまで攻め込まれるとは――不覚！
message.translation: Push your ground and defeat them!

message.original: オークはまだまだいる！ 一匹残らず倒すぞ！
message.translation: The orcs are still in there! Only one more cur to go!

message.original: さすが、レオ隊長が見込んだ新人だな！ このまま砦を掃除するぞ！
message.translation: Captain Leo, the rookie has cleared the remainder of the fort!

message.original: 敵には<COL ff7575><PADM><KEYN RL>／<KEYN RU><KEYM>左／右クリック</KEYM></COL>で基本攻撃！
さらなる攻撃として<COL ff7575><PADM><KEYN L1>／<KEYN R1><KEYM>Shift／Ctrlキー</KEYM></COL>を押しながら</KEYM></COL>
<COL ff7575><PADM><KEYN RL>か<KEYN RU><KEYM>左／右クリック</KEYM></COL>でカスタムスキルだ！
技は画面右下のガイドで確認！
message.translation: Check the guide in the lower right corner of the screen!

message.original: オークや大型の敵には近づき、<COL ff7575><PADM><KEYN RR><KEYM>Eキー</KEYM></COL>でしがみついて攻撃だ！
走る時は<COL ff7575><PADM>移動方向に<KEYN L_STICK>を倒しながら押し込み<KEYM>同じ移動キー２回押し</KEYM></COL>でダッシュだ！
